page.title: 18Shopping in our area .
page.content: There are 2 shops(which include a post office area ),1 in Ashbury and 1 in Bishopstone .They sell groceries , vegetables,fruit, newspapers and sweets aswell as hardware ,toys ,stationery and china .Ashbury probably has a better shop .It would be nice to have a clothes and shoe shop .The shops are often used but many people do their main shopping in Wantage or Swindon because it is cheaper and there is more choice .In about 1958 there were 5 shops in Ashbury -Triangle Cottage,The Cottage (Chapel Lane),a house opposite the Rose and Crown Hotel in the High Street, the present shop on the cross roads and a shop in Berrycroft.By about 1963 there were only 2 shops,the Chapel Lane and cross roads shops. Nowadays mobile shops visit the village and you can buy meat, vegetables,sweets and loan videos from them .
